Text: Read more…  Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) Chairman Ian M. Cook sold 19,500 shares of the stock in a transaction on Monday, September 16th. The shares were sold at an average price of $69.51, for a total value of $1,355,445.00. Following the completion of the transaction, the chairman now directly owns 1,066,725 shares in the company, valued at approximately $74,148,054.75.
